text:
A podcast about light-sheet microscopy with Malte Wachsmuth, director and co-founder of Bruker Luxendo!

In this episode of Keep it Science, Malte shares insights into his life as well as behind-the-scenes information of Bruker’s Luxendo.
Learn about the early days of Luxendo at EMBL with Jan Ellenberg and Lars Hufnagel. Join us to learn how a scientist traveled the world, formed an EMBL spin-off, and now aligns his team.

Listen here: <https://buff.ly/489A9vt>
